meanings.definition: A person who is lazy or idle.
meanings.sent1: The scalls lounged on the couch all day.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a scalls and help with the chores.
meanings.sent3: The scalls pretended to be asleep to avoid work.
meanings.sent4: Her brother was a scalls, always avoiding responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: Being a scalls means missing out on all the fun activities.

meanings.sent1: After falling, his knee scalls were painful.

meanings.sent5: The lizard's scalls shimmered in the sunlight.
